column1: # *CI-chondritic values are strictly normalized to Si = 106 atoms. Photospheric values via N(E)=10A(E)-1.551.

# **Solar system values are from the combined solar and meteoritic datasets in columns (1) and (2) and were re-normalized to Si = 10^6 because the average of solar and meteoritic values is used for Si.
# ‡present day photospheric values corrected for element settling from the convection zone to obtain protosolar values.
